name: 9 Pics
description:
9Pics - A challenging Puzzle Game

9Pics is fun, challenging and simple to play puzzle game. The only puzzle game which has word and picture game combined into one.

How to Play:
* Combine letter tiles to built word matching the pics.

* A wrong answer decreases timer by 10secs.

* Use HINTS to instantly get the name of any pic.

How many pictures can you name? Start playing and guess the 9Pics.

Tip: Stuck on a Pic? Share on instagram, Facebook, twitter and get instant help.
